title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Nine Mile Point
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     Kansas Exhibits     Nine Mile Point                  Nine Mile Point          The Santa Fe Trail passed through Nine Mile Point. In 1823, the official survey of the Santa Fe Trail began, and surveyors laid down their chains, arriving at this point and making note of the "trace" of the trail leading off toward Santa Fe. It was the earliest government documentation of any place on the trail. Click here to view the two exhibits (1 MB, pdf).
